xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/294263-Bongo: Killer Clown 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null A bad 'teen mom" creates a monster in her child by leaving the TV on to serve as a babysitter. A twisted TV clown enters the child's psyche, leading to depraved violence as the persona of Bongo the killer clown emerges. Violence, topless nudity and gore in a psycho-dynamic plot. Bongo is a must see for fans of the genre. Director Geraldine Winters delivers a good story in a matrix of violent dark irony. Bongo: Killer Clown
